ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: We are indebted to the Entomology Team of KEMRI (Nairobi) who spent long hours on the identification of mosquito specimens. Appreciation is also given to many staff at KEMRI for their support in the form of field vehicles, laboratory and office support. We acknowledge the kind support of Maamun Jeneby (ICIPE/IPR). We are further grateful for the assistance of local communities in the surrounding areas and to both the Kenya Forestry Service and the Kenya Wildlife Service for granting permits for research activity and sample collection. Vero and C6/36 cell lines were kindly provided by Robert Tesh (UTMB). We are grateful to Michael Ryba for the production of Figure 1.
